data.1: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,
data.2: And the moon as she follows in his wake,
data.3: The day when it reveals his radiance,
data.4: The night when it covers him over,
data.6: The earth and its spreading out,
data.7: The soul and how it was integrated
data.8: And given the faculty of knowing what is disruptive and what is intrinsic to it.
data.9: He who nourishes it will surely be successful,
data.10: And he who confines it will surely come to grief.
data.11: The Thamud denied (the truth) in their perverseness
data.12: When among them the great wretch arose,
data.13: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God´s she-camel, let her drink."
data.14: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
data.15: He does not fear the consequence.
